metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26937 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: encoding.c in GNU Screen through 4.8.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid write access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted UTF-8 character sequence.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2021-02-18, proposed patch on mailing list not yet commited to upstream repo, but has been released by Debian

criterions.comment: screen package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0-5build2').
